oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Multi-frequency transconductance technique for interface characterization of deep sub-micron SOI-MOSFETs
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KUMAR, A
MAHAPATRA, S
LAL, R
RAO, VR
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A multi-frequency transconductance technique for interface characterization of sub-micron SOI-MOSFETs is implemented. This technique is shown to be highly suitable for interface characterization in Sol devices where conventional charge-pumping techniques cannot be applied. Using this multi-frequency technique, sub-micron SOI-MNSFETs with a SiN dielectric deposited by a novel jet-vapor-deposition (JVD) process are characterized. Results are compared with charge pumping results obtained on bulk MNSFETs with identically processed JVD nitrides. (C) 2001 Elsevier Science Ltd. All rights reserved.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: 11th Workshop on Dielectrics in Microelectronics (WoDiM 2000),MUNICH, GERMANY,NOV 13-15, 2000
